name: DESHBANDHU PALLI SEVA SANGHA
briefDescription: DESHBANDHU PALLI SEVA SANGHA is proud to introduce itself with lots of experience and learning it is a registered social non profit , non political , non goverment organization ,situted in a remort area of west bengal ,from the very begining of its inception in 1950 it started its devlopment acticvities and providing much wanted social and economic opportunities to people both through direct action and through support services. the organization concentrated on education ,vocational traning, devlopment of women, the poor ,the minority people,SHG there income generating ,enveroment,culture, community health care, handricarfts, micro finance/cradit, EDP, agriculture, sanitation and many other welfare as wellas capacity building programmes
